title: Bimoba (1996) Genesis Portion
description: Bimoba translation of the first four chapters of the book of Genesis by the Ghana Institue of Linguistics, Literacy, and Bible Translation. The Bimoba language, sometimes called Moba, is a major language of the Bimoba people of Togo and Ghana.
provider: Ghana Institute of Linguistics, Literacy and Bible Translation

language.name: Bimoba
language.area: Northeast, Gambaga District, south of Kusaasi, north of Konkomba.
